attributes.action: stop giving prisoners the right to vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When someone commits a crime of any kind that carries a prison sentence then they automatically forfeit their civil liberties.  Freedom, the right to earn money, their right to benefits and their right to vote should all be taken from them.  Perhaps the voting rights of law-abiding citizens should be taken into consideration before making changes such as this.
